name: StratoBash
description: Be a contestant on StratoBash! Race up the floating islands along the stratosphere, bashing off Eyeoids, solving puzzles & more to score. Use VR controllers to throw Bashers, or play with a mouse & keyboard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad core + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: One that works Additional Notes: Higher GFX Needed for VR
